title: Michael Caine
summary: Sir Michael Caine CBE (born Maurice Joseph Micklewhite Jr.; 14 March 1933) is an English actor. Known for his distinctive South London accent, he has appeared in more than 130 films in a career spanning six decades, and is considered a British film icon.[2][3] As of February 2017, the films in which Caine has appeared have grossed over $7.8 billion worldwide.[4]
